wiki.content: According to the Rolling In The Deep Songfacts, this revenge song finds Adele laying into a former boyfriend. "It's me making a bit of a statement," she told Q Magazine. "People will hear it and go, Wow, she ain't mucking around." Opening song of the album 21. Adele Adkins is having the best year of her career so far - her album '21' has spent seven weeks at the top spot to date and has been a huge success in America. She had a massive No.2 smash with the bluesy gospel disco tune 'Rolling In The Deep' in January 2011 - the follow-up single 'Someone Like You' swept to the No.1 spot after her beautiful Brits performance in February.
